resources.string: This will email your creation to the author, who will endeavour to include it in future versions. Ensure that you have correctly entered your name and level name. By submitting you enter the level into the public domain. If you have multiple levels to submit then it may be more efficient to send them all from your PC - the levels are stored on the phone external storage
The name to display in the user interface
A clone of Chu Chu Rocket, save the mice from the evil cats!
